ingredients.item: 75g Love Life Quick Cook Barley Mix

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a saucepan and fry the chicken for 5 minutes. Add the stock and barley mix, cover and simmer for 12-15 minutes until the chicken is cooked through with no pink meat.
Add the tomatoes, salad onions, courgettes and chestnuts. Cook for 5 minutes. Stir in the parsley and serve.
